name: (Sabor) Cafe Con Leche Corona
additionalNotes: Handmade in Nicaragua by the legendary Corona Cigar Company, the Caf√© Con Leche Corona is a mellow smoke boasting an oily Connecticut wrapper and top quality blend of aged long filler tobaccos. After plenty of seasoning, each cigar is infused with the essence of dark roast coffee, making for an incredibly satisfying, and highly aromatic smoke. Packaged in affordable bundles of 20, these tasty little treats are flawlessly constructed and have a wonderfully rich pre-light coffee aroma
